lead_paragraph: VALENCIA, Spain, May 15 (AP) — BMW Oracle Racing, the only entry from the United States in the Louis Vuitton Cup, rallied to defeat Luna Rossa of Italy on Tuesday to tie their best-of-nine semifinal series after two flights.
